item.description:
Come join in some fun with another Meetup Group, "Boston Cards and Conversation" for a night of Cribbage, Dreidel & Open Games: It's Cribbage at the Pru, holiday style! This month we are featuring cribbage and dreidel: a traditional Chanukah game. This is an open games event, so any game is welcome.

Trip Leader: Debbie
MEET: Prudential Center, Terrace Food Court, 800 Boylston Street, Boston. They'll be in the REAR of the food court, next to Pizzeria Regina (where the Mega Game Nites are held). For more information visit the group's meetup site at: http://www.cardsconversation.org
RSVP: Please RSVP on our meetup site or their meetup site if you are a member of Boston Cards and Conversation.
COST: Joint event with Boston Cards and Conversation Meetup group, no charge.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to get more details and make arrangements to meet

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: A Cribbage, Dreidel & Open Games nite
